overview: In every profession there is someone who changes the rules of the game. In music, that person is Bruce Swedien.  In the early eighties in Los Angeles, Bruce embarked on a project that revolutionized the music industry forever. For the first time, those involved in that project tell the unknown story behind the work that Bruce did and how his talent ended up being an essential piece in the history of popular culture.  Sonic Fantasy introduces you to the man behind the best music you've ever heard.
tagline: Sometimes you have to wait for something special to happen
title: Sonic Fantasy
